I have the 1.04 version (it says 1.0339) in the down right corner of the game.The kit has almost 4 GB and it's pre cracked. And it works well and I can save. I reached the police station quest without any bugs or crashes. I run the game at 1680x1050. I have a E8400 Intel CPU , 3GB RAM, Windows Xp 64x and a Palit 8800 GTS 512MB card.
However this beeing a 1.4 version...it shows 5 locks icons when the game is loading.They look open , one by one, once you advance in the game, meaning there is a limited levels playable.
If that is the 1.6 version, who knows, maybe you can play more. I doubt it has bugs and you can't save, because it is presumed that a 1.6 version to be better then the last one so who is saying the other way , either is a moron or a company "best man";)
